issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Here's a workaround, using a `gazebo-current` 2.1.0 [deb](http://gazebosim.org/tmp/gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb) that I [modified](http://serverfault.com/questions/250224/how-do-i-get-apt-get-to-ignore-some-dependencies/383958#383958) to change the dependency from `libsdformat-dev` to `sdformat`:

~~~
# Clean up
sudo apt-get remove gazebo gazebo-current sdformat libsdformat-dev libsdformat1 ros-groovy-*
# Install the official gazebo-current to get its dependencies installed
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
# Uninstall the official gazebo-current and libsdformat
sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1
# Install sdformat
sudo apt-get install sdformat
# Get and install the gazebo-current with the modified dependency
wget http://gazebosim.org/tmp/gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
# Proceed with the rest of the installation as usual
sudo apt-get install drcsim
~~~

Here's a workaround, using a gazebo-current 2.1.0 deb that I modified to change the dependency from libsdformat-dev to sdformat:

# Clean up
sudo apt-get remove gazebo gazebo-current sdformat libsdformat-dev libsdformat1 ros-groovy-*
# Install the official gazebo-current to get its dependencies installed
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
# Uninstall the official gazebo-current and libsdformat
sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1
# Install sdformat
sudo apt-get install sdformat
# Get and install the gazebo-current with the modified dependency
wget http://gazebosim.org/tmp/gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i gazebo-current_2.1.0-99~precise_amd64.deb
# Proceed with the rest of the installation as usual
sudo apt-get install drcsim
